FuncDef: This command configures TACACS+ authorization parameters for the VPRN.

ParaDef.Info: Automatically performs a single authorization request to the TACACS+ server for cmd* (all commands) immediately after login, and then use the local profile associated (via the priv-lvl-map) with the priv-lvl returned by the TACACS+ server for all subsequent authorization (except enable-admin). After the initial authorization for cmd*, no further authorization requests will be sent to the TACACS+ server (except enable-admin).
